reviews.review_msg: Professor Mamchur is a dangerous presence on campus, in my opinion. I have never met a more arrogant, domineering, thoroughly brainwashed individual in my life. She is a devout convert to Jungian Type Theory and refuses to deal with anyone until they've been appropriately labelled. My advice? Refuse the test; it's illegal. Report her to the press.
Carolyn is a mentor and friend. Engage her, get to know her, and you will be rewarded. I took PDP with her in 1988. She changed my life.

Anne is quite possibly the best teacher in PDP/Education.  What a shame they can't keep her, because I would do my M.Ed with her.  She is interesting, knowledgable, and models great teaching practice to her students.  The rest of the faculty should watch and learn how it's done.
